item.text: At the end of a sprint, the team holds two events: the sprint review and the [[sprint retrospective]] - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrum_(software_development)#Sprint_review wikipedia]

story.text: At the end of a sprint, the team holds two events: the sprint review and the [[sprint retrospective]] - [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scrum_(software_development)#Sprint_review wikipedia]
At the sprint review, the team:

-  reviews the work that was completed and the planned work that was not completed
-  presents the completed work to the stakeholders (a.k.a. the [[technology demo | demo]])
-  collaborates with the stakeholders on what to work on next

-  Incomplete work cannot be demonstrated.
-  The recommended duration is two hours for a two-week sprint (proportional for other sprint-durations).

# Tools
